scheme_name: Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme - Tamil Nadu
description: Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme provides cashless treatment for critical illnesses for families in Tamil Nadu.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families with annual income below Rs. 1.2 lakh

steps: Register at empanelled hospital or camp

special_notes: Includes diagnostic procedures and follow-up care
